guess = [0, 0, 0]
epsilon varies between 0.00000001 to 0.000000001 to display accurate result.
convergence_matrix = [[3, -1, 1], [0, 1, -1], [1, 1, -2]]
convergence_result = [4, -1, -3]

non_convergence_matrix = [[4, 2, 0], [2, 10, 4], [0, 4, 5]]
non_convergence_result = [2, 6, 5]
